==Trivia==
* The name may be derived from the Ainu {{Lang|mini=1|ain=モシㇼ|ain_rm=mosir}}, meaning "world" or "land".
** The word ''mosir'' is used in terms such as {{Lang|ainu-mosir|ain=アイヌモシㇼ|ain_tl=the quiet earth where humans dwell}} and {{Lang|kamuy-mosir|ain=カムィモシㇼ|ain_tl=the land where the gods reside}}.
* The Pyro Abyss Mages will change positions every day through a series of three days:
** On the first day, a single mage will appear furthest from the Teleport Waypoint.
** On the second day, two mages will appear closer to the waypoint.
** On the third day, three mages will appear instead.
